description: Situated right in the heart of the Bergamo plain in the small town of Caravaggio, famous for the painter of the same name and for a much-visited pilgrim shrine, this welcoming restaurant boasts a modern decor and vintage furnishings. At lunchtime, it serves a good, competitively priced business menu, while in the evening the more elaborate à la carte features contemporary-style meat and fish dishes (mostly the latter).
